content.question: Which of the following demonstrates semantic memory?

choices.label: Esteban remembers the correct way to swing a golf club.
Jane needs to remember that she has a dental appointment next Tuesday.
Elizabeth knows the formula to calculate the area of a square.
Elliott has a vivid memory of their wedding day.

content.answer: Elizabeth knows the formula to calculate the area of a square.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
